DOC.brief_summary: The investigators evaluate the changes of echocardiographic and sleep apnea parameters after mitral valve surgery. The patients undergo echocardiographic and sleep apnea control before surgery. After a period of 3-5 months, they undergo a second echocardiographic and sleep apnea control and the results are evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Echocardiographic Parameter and Sleep Apnea Changes After Mitral Valve Surgery
DOC.criteria: mitral valve defect NYHA IIIV no additional cardiac surgical procedure Pregnancy lung disease regular followup in the study Center in the first 6 months after surgery not guaranteed congenital heart disease
